Hi J.B.,

On 7/18/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>
> And=
reas Guther wrote:
>
> > The fact that setup() and the constructor are equi=
valent as Cedric
> > pointed out is always confusing and something everyone=
 should be aware
> > of using JUnit.
>
> They are not equivalent! It is an =
accident of implementation that
> initializing fixture objects in the const=
ructor behaves the same way as
> the setUp() method does.


Can you clarify=
 this?  If they behave exactly the same way (in JUnit3 at
least), how are t=
hey not equivalent?

-- 
C=E9dric
